heading: HR00534
0:
RESOLUTION FOR THE SPECIAL COMMITTEE ON BASES CONVERSION, OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE RESOLUTION OF THE SANGGUNIANG BAYAN OF CAPAS, TARLAC, REQUESTING FOR A REVIEW OF REPUBLIC ACT 
NO. 7227 OR PROCLAMATION NO. 163, SERIES OF 1993, TO EXCLUDE FOR MILITARY USE PORTIONS OF ZONE C (CROW VALLEY), IN THE SAID MUNICIPALITY, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
principal-authors: COJUANGCO, CARLOS O.; YAP, VICTOR A.; VILLANUEVA, NOEL L.;
status: Pending with the Committee on BASES CONVERSION since 2019-12-11
